name: Jerry and Tom
description: In this Halloween special game you play a mouse who must clear 5 haunted levels to win. These levels won't be easy as known enemies lurk in the corners. But you have your beloved friend cheese to rely on which you can use to defend against these enemies. One cheese ball can kill a bat, three can kill the cat and the spiders will have to be outrun. If you reach the kitchen, you must remember that objects there will fall so don't stay anywhere too long. Good luck and have fun!
